import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row,Col,Image,ListGroup,Button,Card } from 'react-bootstrap' import product from '../product' import Rating from '../components/Rating' function ProductScreen({match}) { const products= product.find((p)=> p._id == match.params.id) return (
{products.name} Go Back

{products.name}

 value={products.rating} text={`${products.numReviews} reviews`} color={'#f8e825'}
) } export default ProductScreen
